require(here)

## Clean the Data

Make it real good yeah.


### Read the unclean data

```{r readUnclean}
responses <- 
  readRDS(here("data/generalRdats/leaderResponsesUnclean.rdat"))

nrow(responses)
ncol(responses)
```
